mapper.sql: messageId, content, customerId, orderId, scheduleId, createDate, department, messageStatus, messageType, noteAdmin, isDel
mapper.select: SELECT j.*,jc.customerName,jc.customerPhone,d2.INFO AS statusInfo,GROUP_CONCAT(d1.INFO) AS department FROM j_customer_message j LEFT JOIN j_customer jc ON j.customerId = jc.customerId LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON d2.ID = j.messageStatus LEFT JOIN j_customer_message_department jcmd ON jcmd.messageId = j.messageId LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON d1.ID = jcmd.department WHERE j.isDel=16 AND j.messageId=#{0}
